file_content.text: This is not your battle.
None of you were on my world when the Empire swept in to destroy it.
You were not one of the Sith who came to my world to destroy it.
It took no subtle spying for your Empire to destroy the peace of my world.
The Empire did not need to waste money on your kind to destroy the peace of my world.
You were not one of the ones whom the Empire used to destroy my world and my people.
It is the admiral who led that attack. It is the admiral who will die for it.
So, you're the one who thinks he can defeat the Empire....
"The Flame," I presume?
I do not know if can, only that I must.
What exactly did the admiral do?
What attack?
Are you going to listen to this freak of nature?
No, you're the one who'll die.
Then you defend these atrocities?
I am Gen'Dai. My people had done nothing to your Empire when they set upon us. They tore our world apart, slaughtered our children or sold them as slaves.
In fact, every species here has suffered an unprovoked attack by your Empire.
He's a terrorist. He's raised an army against the Empire. Destroy him!
You are beaten. Go, take your people and live in peace on another world.
Surrender and you can go.
Why would you say that?
My lord!
That is not your decision to make!
This... this creature should not exist. His species is a mockery of humanity! Of nature!
He led a rebellion against the Empire. He's burned our factories, killed Imperial soldiers....
You wanted me here, now abide by my decision.
Will you fight me on this?
Don't question me!
I would not have this creature pass on word of a rift between us. Your offer stands... for now.
If he continues to act against the Empire, my offer is withdrawn.
He will retire peacefully.
Then your offer stands... for now.
I cannot bring myself to thank one who represents your Empire, but I am impressed with your mercy.
We shall leave Nar Shaddaa. Perhaps there is yet a place in the galaxy where it is possible to live in peace.
No man may strike against the Empire and live.
Now you die!
You've already learned that I do not die easily.
You forget, I've been on your world. I know the secret of your people.
Gen'Dai have no hearts or brains to fail. The only way to destroy them is to shred the bodies and scatter them.
But we proved a billion times over that they're not immortal, right, Gen'Dai? How many of you crawled away? Two, ten?
Kill him! Kill them all!
